languages.text: "Бха!" {n}Кабалит мрачно смеется.{/n} "Твоей шкуры маловато, чтобы Иремерисс приняла меня обратно... впрочем, как знаешь. Я изрядно повеселюсь, наблюдая, как ты будешь искать выход из Комморры".

"Bah!" {n}The Kabalite lets out a grim laugh.{/n} "It will take more than your hide for Yremeryss to accept me back... Still, have it your way. It will provide me with a great deal of amusement to watch you scurry about in search of a different escape out of Commorragh."
languages.original_text: "Бха!" {n}Кабалит мрачно смеется.{/n} "Твоей шкуры маловато, чтобы Иремерисс приняла меня обратно... впрочем, как знаешь. Я изрядно повеселюсь, наблюдая, как ты будешь искать выход из Комморры".

traits.locale_text: "Bwhah!" {n}The Kabalite lets out a grim laugh.{/n} "It will take more than your hide for Yremeryss to accept me back... still, have it your way. It will provide me with a great deal of amusement to watch you scurry about in search of a different escape out of Commorragh."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Bah!" {n}The Kabalite lets out a grim laugh.{/n} "It will take more than your hide for Yremeryss to accept me back... Still, have it your way. It will provide me with a great deal of amusement to watch you scurry about in search of a different escape out of Commorragh."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Bah!" {n}The Kabalite lets out a grim laugh.{/n} "It will take more than your hide for Yremeryss to accept me back... Still, have it your way. It will provide me with a great deal of amusement to watch you scurry about in search of a different escape out of Commorragh."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Bah ! {n}s'exclame le Kabalite en laissant échapper un rire sinistre.{/n} Il faudrait bien plus que votre peau pour qu'Yremeryss m'accepte à nouveau... mais faites comme bon vous semble. Je ne manquerai pas de prendre un certain plaisir à vous voir vous agiter pour trouver une autre façon de quitter Commorragh. »
languages.original_text: "Bah!" {n}The Kabalite lets out a grim laugh.{/n} "It will take more than your hide for Yremeryss to accept me back... Still, have it your way. It will provide me with a great deal of amusement to watch you scurry about in search of a different escape out of Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: « Bah ! {n}s'exclame le Kabalite en laissant échapper un rire sinistre.{/n} Il faudrait bien plus que votre peau pour qu'Yremeryss m'accepte à nouveau... mais faites comme bon vous semble. Je ne manquerai pas de prendre un certain plaisir à vous voir vous agiter pour trouver une autre façon de quitter Commorragh. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “哈哈哈！”{n}玛拉斋阴沉地大笑起来。{/n}“要是想让伊芮梅莉斯赦免我，光是你的人皮恐怕远远不够……不过，随便你吧，你大可以四处奔波，寻找另一条逃离科摩罗的道路。看着你做无用功的样子，一定会非常有趣。”
languages.original_text: "Bah!" {n}The Kabalite lets out a grim laugh.{/n} "It will take more than your hide for Yremeryss to accept me back... Still, have it your way. It will provide me with a great deal of amusement to watch you scurry about in search of a different escape out of Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: “哈哈哈！”{n}玛拉斋阴沉地大笑起来。{/n}“要是想让伊芮梅莉斯赦免我，光是你的人皮恐怕远远不够……不过，随便你吧，你大可以四处奔波，寻找另一条逃离科摩罗的道路。看着你做无用功的样子，一定会非常有趣。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「ブハハ！」{n}カバライトは恐ろしい笑いを浮かべた。{/n}「イレメリスが俺を受け入れるには、貴様の生皮以上のものが必要なのだがな…まあ、好きにしろ。貴様がコモラフから脱出するために、別の方法を探し回るのを見るのは、俺にとって大いに楽しめる余興だ」
languages.original_text: "Bah!" {n}The Kabalite lets out a grim laugh.{/n} "It will take more than your hide for Yremeryss to accept me back... Still, have it your way. It will provide me with a great deal of amusement to watch you scurry about in search of a different escape out of Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: 「ブハハ！」{n}カバライトは恐ろしい笑いを浮かべた。{/n}「イレメリスが俺を受け入れるには、貴様の生皮以上のものが必要なのだがな…まあ、好きにしろ。貴様がコモラフから脱出するために、別の方法を探し回るのを見るのは、俺にとって大いに楽しめる余興だ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Buhaha!" {n}Das Kabale-Mitglied lacht grimmig.{/n} "Es würde mehr als nur Eure Haut erfordern, damit mich Yremeryss wieder aufnimmt ... aber macht, was Ihr wollt. Es wird extrem unterhaltend zu erleben, wie Ihr durch Commorragh irrt und einen anderen Ausweg sucht."
languages.original_text: "Bah!" {n}The Kabalite lets out a grim laugh.{/n} "It will take more than your hide for Yremeryss to accept me back... Still, have it your way. It will provide me with a great deal of amusement to watch you scurry about in search of a different escape out of Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: "Buhaha!" {n}Das Kabale-Mitglied lacht grimmig.{/n} "Es würde mehr als nur Eure Haut erfordern, damit mich Yremeryss wieder aufnimmt ... aber macht, was Ihr wollt." Es wird extrem unterhaltend zu erleben, wie Ihr durch Commorragh irrt und einen anderen Ausweg sucht."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «¡Ja!». {n}El kabalista deja escapar una risa siniestra.{/n} «Haría falta más que tu pellejo para que Yremeryss volviese a aceptarme... pero en fin, lo haremos a tu manera. Me divertiré mucho viéndote corretear buscando alguna otra salida de Commorragh».
languages.original_text: "Bah!" {n}The Kabalite lets out a grim laugh.{/n} "It will take more than your hide for Yremeryss to accept me back... Still, have it your way. It will provide me with a great deal of amusement to watch you scurry about in search of a different escape out of Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ja!». {n}El kabalista deja escapar una risa siniestra.{/n} «Haría falta más que tu pellejo para que Yremeryss volviese a aceptarme... pero en fin, lo haremos a tu manera. Me divertiré mucho viéndote corretear buscando alguna otra salida de Commorragh».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Peh!" {n}Kabalist gaddarca gülümsüyor.{/n} "Yremeryss'in beni geri kabul etmesi için ona senin postundan çok daha fazlasını sunmam gerekir. Yine de sen bilirsin. Cammorragh'tan farklı bir kaçış yolu bulmaya çalışırkenki koşuşturmalarını izlemek benim için büyük eğlence kaynağı olacak."
languages.original_text: "Bah!" {n}The Kabalite lets out a grim laugh.{/n} "It will take more than your hide for Yremeryss to accept me back... Still, have it your way. It will provide me with a great deal of amusement to watch you scurry about in search of a different escape out of Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: "Peh!" {n}Kabalist gaddarca gülümsüyor.{/n} "Yremeryss'in beni geri kabul etmesi için ona senin postundan çok daha fazlasını sunmam gerekir. Yine de sen bilirsin. Cammorragh'tan farklı bir kaçış yolu bulmaya çalışırkenki koşuşturmalarını izlemek benim için büyük eğlence kaynağı olacak."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
